user_query: I'm a motorcycle enthusiast and I'm looking for information about different motorcycle models. Can you provide me with the models available for BMW motorcycles in the year 2015? Additionally, I need the image link for the article ID 804882. Moreover, I would like to search for addresses in New York using the Geo_Coder_Dev API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of BMW motorcycle models available in 2015.
Fetch the image link for the article with ID 804882.
Search for addresses in New York using geocoding functionalities.
